mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bg_like WHERE midx=#{midx} AND pidx=#{pidx}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bg_cart WHERE midx=#{midx}

SELECT li.pidx, pr.pname, pr.saleprice, im.main, li.interest_idx FROM bg_like li JOIN bg_product pr ON pr.pidx = li.pidx JOIN bg_image im ON im.pidx = li.pidx WHERE midx=#{midx} AND li.rdate >= to_char(sysdate-365)
AND pr.kind='R' AND pr.kind='E' AND pr.kind='N' AND pr.kind='B'
ORDER BY li.pidx ASC
